vlive.korean: 고마워 - 자르게 된 계기가 있나요? Thank you. - What made you do so? 듣기 View video NCT : 127💚니가좋아💚
vlive.english: Thank you. - What made you do so?

vlive.korean: 저랑 이제 조금 친해질 계기가 있었던 것 같아요 같이 팀을 했었나? There was a reason we were able to get closer... Was it same team? 듣기 View video ITZY : 류진이의 왓어원더풀나잇💙
vlive.english: There was a reason we were able to get closer... Was it same team?

vlive.korean: 먹게 된 계기가... The reason why I started... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 19🦊
어떤 계기들로 이렇게 좀 배우고 하게 됐어요? what made you sing at first? 듣기 View video CASPER RADIO : 권정열 고영배의 십란한밤 #120 with 첸(CHEN) of 엑소(EXO)
vlive.english: what made you sing at first?

vlive.korean: 그 부분에 있어서 이번 연도, 또 계기? In that case... For this year, and reason? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 오늘도 행복한 하루 보내셨나용?❤
vlive.english: In that case... For this year, and reason?

examples.korean: That will be a good career move 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것이 직장 생활에 좋은 계기가 될 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That will be a good career move Add to Wordbook

examples.english: Check the tyre pressure on the dial. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The incident served as a timely reminder of just how dangerous mountaineering can be. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사건은 등산이 얼마나 위험할 수 있는지를 때맞춰 상기시키는 계기가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The incident served as a timely reminder of just how dangerous mountaineering can be. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What made you decide on a career as a vet? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 수의사를 직업으로 삼을 결심을 하게 된 계기는 무엇이었습니까? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What made you decide on a career as a vet? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This gauge tells you how much fuel you have left. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 계기는 연료가 얼마나 남았는지를 알려[보여] 준다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
